projects.name: Sign Detection System for Impaired Person App
projects.description: The Sign Detection System is an AI-powered application designed to bridge the communication gap for individuals facing speech and hearing challenges. It recognizes sign language gestures using machine learning models and converts them into text or speech, enabling seamless interaction.

projects.name: Food Waste Management App
projects.description: The Food Waste Management App enables efficient redistribution of surplus food to those in need, reducing waste and promoting sustainability. It also leverages AI to suggest possible dishes from leftover ingredients, ensuring optimal food utilization.

projects.name: CricbOI
projects.description: CicbOI is a dedicated platform for cricket players to register and manage their personal profiles for cricket organizations.

projects.name: CareNow
projects.description: CareNow is an Android application that can be beneficial for patients and caregivers. It helps patients to connect with caregivers according to their needs and caregivers can get job opportunities.

projects.name: Me-tadata
projects.description: Me-tadata is my personal website which introduces me.

projects.name: Speak2Sheet
projects.description: Speak2Sheet is an intelligent speech-to-Excel converter that transforms spoken data into structured spreadsheet entries with accuracy and efficiency.

projects.name: My-Command
projects.description: My-Command is a voice-controlled desktop assistant that executes essential system commands effortlessly. It allows users to open applications, play specific songs, perform web searches, and automate common tasks with simple voice inputs.

projects.name: Locity
projects.description: Locity is a real-time city bus tracking app designed to enhance the travel experience for commuters. It provides live location updates of buses, estimated arrival times, and route details, ensuring hassle-free and efficient travel.

projects.name: DigVid
projects.description: DigVid stands for Digital Video Library that was a website which was a collection of all video lectures and study materials related to Information Technology. DigVid is my Final Year project which got First Prize in final year projects.

projects.name: JnearS
projects.associated_with: Yeshwantrao Chavan College of Engineering - YCCE
projects.description: JnearS is a website. Jnears was an experiment for connecting all juniors and seniors in the college campus.

projects.name: Locify
projects.description: Locify is an Android application which can be used to track someone's location and verify if anyone moved to unwanted places. Once my principal randomly asked all of us to try to create an application that would notify them of any student or faculty moving from campus, I got an idea and tried my best.

projects.name: Digital Library
projects.description: Digital Library is a website that provides all study material related to Information Technology for all semesters. This was a college project and is still running on the college website: http://gpnd-digital-lab.rf.gd

projects.name: Java Compiler
projects.description: It is a software project which is a fully working Java compiler based on Java and some knowledge about Operating System Commands. It was designed in VB.NET. When I was learning Java programming, the basic technique of compiling Java programs was difficult, and while there were many IDEs available that made writing programs easier, I tried my best to solve this problem.
